text: Gajadhar Majhi is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha, the lower house of the Parliament of India from Sundargarh, Odisha as a member of the Indian National Congress. ==References== ==External links== *Official Biographical Sketch in Lok Sabha Website Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Lok Sabha members from Odisha Category:5th Lok Sabha members Category:Indian National Congress politicians
title: Gajadhar Majhi
